title: Large-Scale Adaptive Learning Design in Social Studies Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic sociological concepts (politics, economics, culture, etc.)
context.additional_context: A system capable of providing personalized content through analysis of individual learning patterns in a flipped learning environment utilizing VR simulations for graduate students in social sciences

learning_goals: Learners can execute self-directed learning strategies with over 80% accuracy in flipped learning environments
Learners enhance real-world case analysis capabilities through VR simulation-based social problem-solving activities
Learners improve learning efficiency by over 20% by revising personalized learning plans based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
